product_name: Sugoi Titan Ice T-Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Stay cool as your body heats up in the men's Sugoi Titan Ice T-shirt. It uses technologically advanced fabric to provide comfort and cooling airflow during long runs in hot weather. Moisture-wicking, quick-drying breathable fabric features a specialized technology that reduces the surface temperature of the fabric to create a cooling effect. Rear pocket stores essentails; specially placed seams reduce abrasion. The men's Sugoi Titan Ice T-shirt features reflective accents. Closeout.
short_description: Stay cool as your body heats up in the men's Sugoi Titan Ice T-shirt. It uses technologically advanced fabric to provide comfort and cooling airflow during long runs in hot weather.
